channel.title: Gamecrash by flashlight
channel.description: I'm at the very beginning of the level bm_c1a1 where you go down or up in an elevator. At first the level wouldn't load and hl2.exe would stop responding. After reloading it and pressing many buttons I turned of the flashlight and now it runs again, until I turned the flashlight on again. No idea how this happens

item.title: Gamecrash by flashlight
item.dc:creator: Slacker
item.description:
Slacker:

I’m at the very beginning of the level bm_c1a1 where you go down or up in an elevator. At first the level wouldn’t load and hl2.exe would stop responding. After reloading it and pressing many buttons I turned of the flashlight and now it runs again, until I turned the flashlight on again. No idea how this happens

Did some more fooling around. It crashes when looking in the direction (with the flashlight on) of the elevator or just the hallway

Read full topic
